page.title: 08Dixon's field ,M Risborough
page.content: Dixon's field is situated at the junction of Peter's Lane and the Aylesbury Rd.,Monks Risborough.The land is owned by the National Trust.It is mainly used by Risborough football club. It has one football pitch and changing facilities in one corner.The field is used annually for the Monks Risborough Horticultural Show, which is every August.The school also used the field up until 6 years ago for football matches and for its sports day before the school had its own field. The field has in the past been used for the Princes Risborough Carnival.
